devdoc.author: Ameer Hamza
devdoc.details: This implements price feeds as our library

fund().details: This function gets conversion rate (Eth -> USD) from PriceConverter library

getAddressToAmountFunded(address).details: sAddressToAmountFunded is prefixed with s to demonstrate that it is storage variableStorage variables should be handled carefully because they will cost a lot of gas

getFunder(uint256).details: sFunders is prefixed with s to demonstrate that it is storage variableStorage variables should be handled carefully because they will cost a lot of gas

getOwner().details: iOwner is prefixed with 'i' to show that it is immutableImmutable variables can save some gas

devdoc.title: A contract for crowd funding

fund().notice: This function collect funds and save into FundMe contract

getAddressToAmountFunded(address).notice: This function returns the amount funded by any address

getFunder(uint256).notice: This function returns the funder by index

getOwner().notice: This function returns the owner of the contract

getPriceFeed().notice: This function returns the priceFeed instance

userdoc.notice: This contract is to demo a sample funding contract
